meanings.definition: To make impure by contact or mixture
meanings.sent1: Leaving trash on the beach contaminates the sand and water.
meanings.sent2: Oil spills can contaminate the ocean, harming marine life.
meanings.sent3: Accidentally dropping the paint can contaminates the whole room!
meanings.sent4: Negative thoughts can contaminate a positive mindset.
meanings.sent5: The virus quickly contaminates the entire population if not contained.

meanings.sent1: Carelessly throwing garbage contaminates the environment.
meanings.sent2: The factory's waste contaminates the nearby river.
meanings.sent3: Spilling juice on the white carpet contaminates its pristine look.
meanings.sent4: A lie can contaminate a relationship beyond repair.
meanings.sent5: The toxic fumes from the factory contaminates the air we breathe.
